summary: Capability discovery completed with machine-observed evidence. Commands run: `python3 --version && which python3 && which codex && codex --version` => Python 3.13.5, /usr/bin/python3, /usr/local/bin/codex, codex-cli 0.106.0; `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -m wdib --help` succeeded and listed the `tick` command; `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -m wdib tick --help` succeeded; `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -m unittest discover -s tests -v` => 5 tests ran, 5 passed (test_wdib_codex_prompt, test_wdib_hardware_probe x2, test_wdib_reducer x2). State/context probes: `cat devices/.../state.json` shows becoming empty, tasks=[], hardware_requests=[], incidents=[]; `wc -c src/SPIRIT.md` => 0 (no spirit text yet). Result contract verification: `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -c "from pathlib import Path; from wdib.contracts import load_json, validate_payload; p=Path('devices/58f88ed7-929d-4b28-ac18-ba4f59e93a00/runtime/worker_results/cycle-001-20260301T010558.json'); payload=load_json(p); validate_payload(payload, 'worker_result.schema.json', label='worker_result'); print('worker_result_schema_valid')"` => worker_result_schema_valid.
